posts.post_title: WTB The Following T206 HOF's in SGC50 or Better
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase the following T206 HOFers in SGC50 or better (NO PSA Please):

Chief Bender, Portrait
All 3 Mordecai Brown cards
Jack Chesbro
Both Fred Clarke cards
Eddie Collins
Jimmy Collins

Thanks for your consideration.  Please let me know your asking price.

Phil
I am selling a Mordecai Brown SGC 50.  E-mail me at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url] if interested.
